QuestData.Title: Weapons of Mass Dysfunction
QuestData.Description: <Glibbs mops sweat from his brow with a greasy handkerchief.>$B$BSaurfang isn't happy with our work? This is very bad. My boys need to step it up.$B$BMaybe you can help set an example. A set of Hellscream Demolishers just rolled off the blocks and are ready for inspection. Give them a thorough going-over, and if you find any problems, give the Chief Engineer a good thrashing. Remind them that the Horde is depending upon them!
QuestData.LogDescription: Inspect Hellscream Demolishers until you find a faulty one, then teach its Chief Engineer a lesson.
QuestData.RewardText: Some lessons need be rough to be learned.$B$BWith this, our preparations are nearly complete.
